TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConditionedActivityGroup extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity implements class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1<class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>
Public NotInheritable Class ConditionedActivityGroup Inherits CompositeActivity Implements IActivityEventListener(Of ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs)
type ConditionedActivityGroup = class inherit CompositeActivity interface IActivityEventListener<ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>

summary.span: 为一组子活动提供基于限制的执行上下文定义。

span.span: Provides the definition of a constraint-based execution context for a set of child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活动是一种 ，这意味着 活动可以包含其他活动。The activity is a , meaning the activity can contain other activities. 活动基于其 `when` 条件的计算结果运行和重新执行子活动。The activity runs and re-executes child activities based on the evaluation of their `when` conditions. 在需要时，会基于其数据和状态更改依赖项计算所有规则。All rules are evaluated whenever required based on their data and state change dependencies. 当 的完成规则计算结果为 `true` 时，它会立即取消当前正在执行的任何子活动并完成。When the completion rule of the evaluates to `true`, it immediately cancels any currently executing child activities and finishes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 设置为 `null`，这意味着 `BookingCAG` 类永远都不会完成。The following code example shows how to set the to `null`, which means the `BookingCAG` class never completes. 此代码示例摘自 SimpleCAGWorkflow.Designer.cs 文件中的“ConditionedActivityGroup”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the ConditionedActivityGroup SDK Sample from the SimpleCAGWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Using ConditionedActivityGroup](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984)。For more information, see [Using ConditionedActivityGroup](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984).
